i want to be an explorer.

participant_2.background:
I'd like to share my love of reading and cooking with you.
I dress to impress, even when my heart is broken.
I went to the beach and relaxed.
I check my phone to see if there are any messages.
I am a mystery buff and live in London.

content.text: Hey, I'm from the US and I just got back from a trip to London. Did you hear about the big storm?
Hi, I'm glad you enjoyed your trip to London. I was in London for the storm but it wasn't too bad. Did you do anything while you were there?
I spent most of the time exploring the countryside. I love driving through the country and listening to music. I also spent some time in London.
That sounds like a great way to spend your trip. I love reading mysteries and I'm a bit of a mystery buff. Have you ever read any good mysteries?
I have not read any mysteries in a while but I used to love them. I'm going to have to check out some new mysteries.
I'm sure you'll find some good ones. I love reading mysteries and I'm always looking for new ones to read.
I'm also a big fan of cooking. I love trying new recipes and cooking for my friends and family.
I love cooking too. I love sharing my love of cooking with others. I'm always looking for new ways to cook and experiment with different recipes.
I love that. Cooking is such a great way to connect with others.
I agree. Cooking is a great way to relax and have fun.
